cs.tcd.ie

Class Sensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs.tcd.ie.Node
      • cs.tcd.ie.Sensor

  • public class Sensor
extends Node
    Client class an instance accepts user input, sends packets and receivers ACK packets. Also handles timeout errors and sequence NAK's

    • Method Summary

      resendPacket Method - Allows system to re-send packet if NAK is received
      void start()
      Sender Method will create and send the first packet from the sensor also initializes the timeout length
      void timeout()
      timeout method is called by the node abstract class when a timeout exception occurs will attempt to resend the packet and will ask to reconnect or terminate if it fails
